General.Name: Shanghai Serum Bio-Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shanghai Serum Bio-Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, operation, and sale of antitoxin and antiserum biological products in China. It offers equine tetanus immunoglobulin, anti-venom, and anti-rabies serum products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shanghai, China.
